entry.content:
Hi,

 

Business want to print a commodity code description in intercompany billing print. i have checked this cds view C_CommodityCodeForKeyDate but the official description not available in this cds view C_CommodityCodeForKeyDate. kindly suggest us how to fetch the official description of commodity code.

entry.title: challenges facing while creating CBO
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am working with Custom Business Objects in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and I have created two CBOs:

  1. Product Group Management (CBO1)

    • CODPROD (CHAR, 4) → Product Group

    • CODDESCR (CHAR, 30) → Description

  2. Assign Product Group (CBO2)

    • CODPROD (CHAR, 4) → Product Group

    • CODDESCR (CHAR, 30) → Description

    • CHECKSER (CHAR, 1) → Serial Check

    • ZSERIAL (CHAR, 30) → Mandatory List of serials

My requirement:
In CBO2, I want to fetch CODPROD and CODDESCR values from CBO1 (instead of maintaining them separately).

Problem:
I tried using association from CBO2 to CBO1, but I am getting errors. It seems the CBO framework only allows referencing the root entity, not directly fetching additional fields.

Question:
👉 How can I properly model this scenario so that CBO2 uses CODPROD from CBO1, and also displays CODDESCR without duplicating data? Should I handle this via association + custom CDS view join, or is there a direct way in CBO itself?

Thanks in advance for your guidance!

ABAP Development SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Extensibility

entry.title: Purchase Order Accrual - Tax postings in S4HC
entry.content:
I would like to ask the expert advice regarding "Purchase Order Accrual - Tax postings" on KBA 3157756 and Help page.
https://me.sap.com/notes/3157756/E
https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0fa84c9d9c634132b7c4abb9ffdd8f06/10c9485e3dc849928ca41ac92d72132a.html?locale=en-US

Query:
In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, it appears that the BAdI for tax calculation provided in the Private Cloud is not on the available list. Is there a method to perform tax posting within the Accruals Engine in the Public Cloud Edition? Can BADI_ACE_DOCUMENT_SCHEMA_CUST be used as a substitute, or is there another way to achieve this without using a BAdI? I would appreciate any guidance you can provide on this topic.
Thank you for your support & Kindly Regards,
Koji Mikami

entry.title: Procurement and Sales report based on Country of Origin
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Is there any Standard report available for Procurement and Sales based on Country of Origin for material in Public cloud ?

entry.title: How to validate mandatory attachment in Post General Journal Entries app in SAP S/4HANA Cloud?
entry.content:
Hello,

In the application ‘Post General Journal Entries’, the user requires a validation or an indication that prompts the processor to attach a mandatory supporting document. If no attachment is provided, the system should display an error message preventing the posting.

We have analyzed this requirement and attempted to implement a validation rule; however, we did not find any option related to attachments for validation. Additionally, we explored potential BAdIs to achieve this functionality, but unfortunately, no suitable option was found for this scenario.

entry.title: WBS element assigned to GR/IR account in invoice but not goods receipt
entry.content:
Hello experts, 

We are working in a SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition system where we are creating POs with WBS element as account assignment (category Project). 

When posting goods receipt the WBS element is only populated on the class 6 G/L account:

However in the invoice document, the GR/IR account has the WBS element assigned. 

Why is the CO object populating on a balance sheet account, and why is it only appearing in one of the postings? Both lines containing the WBS element are debit postings and this is causing issues in reports. Is there a way of solving this?

Best regards, 

Tina

entry.title: How to create custom communication scenarios in S4H Public Cloud Dev Tenant ?
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We have developed OData services directly on the S/4HANA Public Cloud development tenant and created a UI in BAS to consume these services (using the Developer Extensibility approach). During testing in BAS, we need to create custom communication scenarios; however, the option to create custom communication scenarios in the development tenant is currently greyed out/disabled.

Based on the information provided in SAP Note 2486898, to enable the creation of custom communication scenarios, we need to activate Key User Extensibility using the Extensibility Settings app. However, when we attempt to do this in the development tenant, the system displays a message indicating that Key User Extensibility is disabled in the development tenant and that the Customizing tenant should be used instead.

In the Customizing tenant, Key User Extensibility is enabled, and we are able to create communication scenarios. However, we cannot transport the OData services to the Customizing tenant without first testing them in the Development tenant.

Is there a way to test the services in BAS while connecting directly to the Development tenant?

Thank you!

Regards,

Karthik

entry.title: Product Master Classification
entry.content: We would like to classify the product into 5 categories and want to check in the report or screen

entry.title: SAP DRC - Unable to Submit Credit Note Due to Missing UUID of Original Invoice
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

We’re currently facing an error when submitting a credit note — the system prompts that the “Original e-Invoice Reference Number is missing”, which refers to the missing UUID of the original invoice.

According to the SAP website here Creating and Submitting Electronic Customer Invoices to the Tax Authority | SAP Help Portal, it’s mentioned that when creating a source correction document through the Create Outgoing Invoices app, we should enter the internal document number of the original invoice in the HeaderText field under the header details. This should allow the system to automatically populate the IRBM unique identifier number and the internal document number of the original invoice in the XML file of the correction document.

However, in our case, the credit note isn’t pulling the IRBM unique identifier automatically, and it still needs to be entered manually.

Has anyone experienced this issue or found a solution? Appreciate any insights.

entry.title: Automatically Align Document, Pricing, and Billing Dates in Sales Orders
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

in the app “Manage Sales Orders – Version 2”, the Document Date, Pricing Date, and Billing Date should always be the same.
When the Document Date is changed, the other dates should be updated accordingly.

Is this possible in  SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?

Thanks in advance!
Katharina

entry.title: Transfer Custom Field from Business Partner to Sales Order
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I have created a custom field for Business Partner.
Is it possible to automatically transfer the value of this field to a corresponding custom field in Sales Order when a Sales Order is created for that Business Partner?

If yes, could you please share how this can be achieved.

Thanks in advance! 

Katharina

entry.title: Material Purchase Text Not Printed for Subcontracting Items
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I'm currently facing an issue related to purchase order printing and would appreciate any insights:

For standard purchase order items, the material purchase text is printed correctly, as expected.

However, the behavior changes when it comes to subcontracting items (item category L):

  • The material purchase text is not determined for the main material of the subcontracting item.
  • Instead, the texts for the components are retrieved and printed; which is not desired in our case.

I've already analyzed the behavior and explored potential enhancement options. The only possibly relevant point I found was the BAdI MMPUR_PO_STD_ITEM_TEXT. However, at that point in time, all relevant input variables appear to be empty, so it doesn't seem helpful for this use case.

Unfortunately, my research (OSS Notes, forums, blogs) hasn't led to a solution.

My question to the community: Has anyone encountered a similar issue or found a workaround/enhancement spot that allows the material purchase text to be included for subcontracting items in the PO output?

Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated!

Best regards,

Manuela

entry.title: How to add account assignment columns to PR item table in My Inbox (Public Cloud)?
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I’m working in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition and have a question regarding the "My Inbox" app for the overall release of Purchase Requisitions (PR).

Currently, when I open a PR approval task in My Inbox, the item details are shown in a table inside the task UI. This table displays standard columns like material, quantity, price, etc.

My requirement:
I need to add additional columns to this table for account assignment data—specifically:

  • GL account
  • Cost center
  • WBS element

The goal is to show these fields directly in the item table, so approvers don’t have to drill down into each item’s detail screen.

Questions:

  1. Is there any supported way in Public Cloud to enhance the columns of the item table in the My Inbox task UI?
  2. Can this be achieved via Custom Fields and Logic, or any BAdI/CDS extension?
  3. If not possible, what are the recommended alternatives?

Any guidance, documentation, or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Kind Regards,
Simon

entry.title: Is it possible to have value help for custom field based on authorisation?
entry.content:
Hi,

We are creating a custom field in the system with the code list that has company code and ISB number.

Since it has company code, it should show only the values based on company code authorization. This means the user who does not have access to particular company code, should not be able to see values in code list for that company code.

 

Can you please let us know if this is possible in cloud?

Thanks & regards

entry.content:
Hello,

I have got automatic purchase order process after goods receipt. However in order to reach my aim I need to click on automatic purchase order tick in movement types. I would like to copy 101 and I need to click on automatic PO button. We want you to help us as soon as possible. 

Thank you

entry.title: Parallel accounting activation in future
entry.content:
Dear Cloud Public Edition experts,

I would like to ask clarification regarding the limitation and recommendation for scope item activation after Run phase (after go-live).

My customer has decided the activation of scope item 1GA (Accounting and Financial Close – Group Ledger IFRS (1GA)) during the initial set-up phase.
However, some scope items like FI-AA matter (J62 and 1GB) are not taken into account yet.
My customer is now considering the activation in future because they have no clear business requirements as of now for IFRS treatment.

In current situation, does SAP recommend them to activate J62 and 1GB during the initial set-up phase? or after go-live when they have clear business requirements on FI-AA?

Thank you for your support & Kindly Regards,
Ai Takahashi

entry.title: Forecasting in Intercompany Stock Transfer Scenario
entry.content:
Hi All,

Issue Statement: Forecasting in Intercompany Stock Transfer Scenario

We are working with an intercompany stock transfer setup in SAP S/4HANA, where:

  • Plant A is the supplying plant under Company Code A
  • Plant B is the selling plant under Company Code B

The challenge arises in the forecasting process:

  • The sales demand originates from Plant B, making it the logical source of truth for forecasting.
  • However, consumption postings (e.g., movement types 687 and 601) are recorded against Plant A, the supplying plant.

This creates a disconnect between where the demand is generated (Plant B) and where consumption is posted (Plant A), which complicates the forecasting process. How can I get the forecast consumption ? 

 

  • How should forecasting be handled in this scenario to ensure accurate demand planning at Plant B?
  • Is there a standard SAP approach to link consumption data from Plant A back to Plant B for forecasting purposes?
  • Should we consider custom logic or reporting to reflect true demand at Plant B?

entry.title: Alternative GR/IR account for procurement
entry.content:
We have a requirement to have an alternative GR/IR account for certain types of consumption/service procurement postings. For this we assigned a valuation class to a material group in the SSCUI 'Entry Aids for Items Without a Material Master' (101602), created a G/L account and configured this in the SSCUI 'Automatic account determination'. But the system is not picking our alternative GL account for the GR/IR posting key in the goods receipt, instead it is posting to the delivered GR/IR Account.

 

 

 


--- Steps to Reproduce ---

Log in into the dev system, and check the configuration. Create the PO for procurment of material group DIGITS and the account detrmination is not rflecting as expected, the one configured. Instead it is taking the standard G/L.



*Note To SAP:
I give approval for SAP Support to use these Steps to Reproduce, while connected to my impacted non-production environments, even if the steps result in a change being made and my approval remains valid until the issue is resolved, unless I inform SAP Support otherwise.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.
